name: Celestial Bullet Souls
description:
FULLSCREEN REQUIRED!!

So i made 2.5D bullet souls for the GameJam, have fun and good luck players !

Credits for used assets:

- Classic Footstep SFX by Mathew Anett; Concrete Textures Pack, by Nobiax / Yughues; Creature_Rhinoceros by Vadim Ziambetov, "Deep In Space" by Breitbarth, Fantasy Chess RPG Character - Arthur by Momomo, Stylized Lava Materials by Rob Luo, Cartoon FX Free by Jean Moreno, Soundbits by Soundbits, Milky Way Skybox by Adam Bielecki, Universe Sounds free pack by Marcin Klosowski, hopefullyI covered it all !
